author: Press Advantage
title: Denver Tub Pros Leads in Refinishing Excellence: Expands Premium Services Across Denver Metro | User | dailytimesleader.com
text:
Denver Tub Pros Refinishing , recognized as a foremost entity in the realm of bathtub refinishing in Denver, Colorado, is excited to publicize its service expansion throughout the Denver metro area. This strategic move is in direct response to the escalating demand for premium bathtub refinishing, reglazing, and repair services. Denver Tub Pros is dedicated to presenting economical and environmentally sustainable options that enhance the longevity of bathtubs, positioning itself as a preferable alternative to bathtub replacement and enabling consumers to save up to 75% of replacement costs.
The innovative approach of Denver Tub Pros Refinishing incorporates a proprietary non-acid refinishing process that is adaptable to numerous bathtub materials such as acrylic, fiberglass, cultured marble, and porcelain. The process commences with an exhaustive two-step cleaning procedure to eradicate mineral deposits, body oils, and soap scum, followed by the meticulous repair of visible chips and cracks. The application of a proprietary bonding agent secures a robust adhesion between the new finish and the original surface. This procedure is finalized with a fine spray finish of durable acrylic coating, significantly restoring the bathtub's aesthetic appeal and facilitating easier cleaning and maintenance.
Moreover, Denver Tub Pros diversifies its offerings through reglazing services and repairs, addressing issues such as obsolete colors, stains, and conspicuous damage. The reglazing process enhances the bathtub's appearance through buffing and polishing, while the repair services tackle various challenges, including cracked fiberglass and leaking terrazzo shower pans. These integral services collectively aim to prolong the functionality of a bathtub for approximately 12-15 years or more.
Stan Bomin, the spokesperson for Denver Tub Pros Refinishing, shared his enthusiasm regarding the service expansion, "We are thrilled to extend our services across the Denver metro area. Our aspiration is to furnish our clientele with accessible and exceptional bathtub refinishing solutions. This expansion constitutes a significant milestone for our dedicated team, and we eagerly anticipate assisting more customers in Denver."
This expansion initiative has already elicited positive reactions from customers. An exemplary bathtub refinishing review on the company's Google Maps listing commends Denver Tub Pros for their professionalism, swift response times, and superior craftsmanship. Such testimonials underscore the firm's commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
"We are immensely proud of the affirmative feedback we receive from our patrons. Each bathtub refinishing review reinforces our mission. By rejuvenating bathtubs, we not only facilitate financial savings for our customers but also advocate for environmental sustainability through waste reduction. Our gratitude extends to the Denver community for allowing us to contribute, and we are eager to persist in our endeavors," Bomin further elaborated.
Individuals interested in Denver Tub Pros and its services can find additional information on Denver Tub Pros website. These resources encompass articles on bathtub resurfacing, comparisons between contemporary and standard bathrooms, and insights into porcelain tub refinishing, offering homeowners valuable perspectives when contemplating bathtub refinishing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcY7rmQk2L4
Denver Tub Pros remains steadfast in its commitment to delivering exceptional craftsmanship at reasonable prices, advocating for eco-friendly cleaning methods to maintain the appearance and hygiene of the refinished bathtubs. With the extension of their services, Denver Tub Pros Reinforcing its position as the top-tier provider of dependable, efficient, and cost-effective bathtub refinishing services in Denver, Colorado.
###
For more information about Denver Tub Pros, contact the company here:
Denver Tub Pros
Stan Bomin
(720) 262-2229
denvertubpros@gmail.com
600 17th Street
Denver, CO 80202

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: HR Certified Wins Three 2023 Best of America Small Business Awards | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: HR Certified won the 2023 Best of America Small Business Award sponsored by BASA Awards, coming out on top over hundreds of other competitors — HR Certified, a standout in the realm of professional development, has recently emerged triumphant in the prestigious Best of America Small Business Awards (BASA) by clinching three distinctive accolades. The company, helmed by Anthony P. Howard as its Founder and CEO, secured top honors in the categories of Best Startup - Education & Training, Best Campaign - Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Of The Year, and also secured a coveted spot in the TopList, boasting one of the entries with the highest number of votes from the public across all categories. The BASA Awards, a highly anticipated event in the small business community, provided a platform for HR Certified to shine. Beating out hundreds of competitors, the company's success is a testament to its dedication to excellence in education and its unwavering commitment to fostering diversity, equity, and inclusion. The awards were presented to HR Certified through a virtual ceremony, a fitting acknowledgment of the digital age. To delve deeper into the specifics of the accolades and the event itself, interested individuals can visit the company's website at https://www.basawards.com/pages/2023-usa-basa-awards-winners . The comprehensive details available on the website provide insights into the criteria for nomination, the judging process, and the distinguished panel of judges responsible for evaluating the contenders. One distinctive aspect of the BASA Awards is the requirement for potential recipients to self-nominate, fostering a sense of proactivity and commitment to excellence. The judging process, as outlined on the website, involved a meticulous evaluation, with contenders needing to score 75% and above to be considered for the Best of America Small Business Award. The evaluation incorporated input from an independent panel of judges, public voting, and the amalgamation of both public and judge scores ultimately determining the category winners. Anthony P. Howard, the visionary behind HR Certified, expressed his delight at the company's stellar performance in the BASA Awards. In a statement, he emphasized the significance of a process devoid of the influences of big corporations, nepotism, or pay-to-play frameworks. Howard articulated the company's gratitude for being recognized and rewarded for its impactful contributions. "It was important for us to be pressure-tested with a process that big corporations, nepotism, or pay-to-play frameworks did not influence. We are grateful to have been noticed and rewarded for our impact," remarked Anthony P. Howard, underlining the integrity and transparency of the awarding process. HR Certified's triumph in the Best Startup - Education & Training category attests to its innovative approach in the realm of professional development. The company has evidently carved a niche for itself by providing top-notch educational services, with its HR Masterclass which activates the highest potential in HR professionals through HRCI and SHRM certification coupled with professional coaching, opportunities to expand professional networks and providing community to its clients. The recognition for the Best Campaign - Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Of The Year highlights HR Certified's commitment to fostering an inclusive workplace environment. In an era where diversity and inclusion are paramount, the company's emphasis on these values is not just a strategic move but a genuine reflection of its organizational ethos. The organization has made information accessible through hosting LinkedIn Live events on cutting-edge topics and through its Campaign, they have extended scholarships to under-resourced diverse talent and their allies. Furthermore, securing a place in the TopList with one of the entries receiving the highest number of votes from the public showcases the widespread support and approval HR Certified enjoys from its audience. The public's validation, coupled with the endorsement from industry experts, solidifies the company's position as a leader in its field. For those keen on delving into the intricacies of HR Certified's journey to success and its notable achievements at the BASA Awards, the company's official website provides a comprehensive resource. The webpage https://www.basawards.com/pages/2023-usa-basa-awards-winners serves as a hub for information, offering a detailed account of the award categories, the selection process, and the distinguished individuals comprising the judging panel. In conclusion, HR Certified's triumphant sweep at the BASA Awards is a testament to the company's unwavering commitment to excellence, innovation, and inclusivity. As the accolades continue to pour in, HR Certified stands as a shining example in the small business landscape, setting benchmarks for others to emulate. The journey from self-nomination to securing top honors underscores the company's dedication to meritocracy and the positive impact it has on the professional development landscape. Contact Info: Name: Anthony P Howard, SPHR, SHRM-SCP Email: Send Email Organization: HR Certified LLC Address: 504 Fair Street Southwest, Atlanta, GA 30313, United States Phone: +1-312-262-3872 Website: https://gethrcertified.com/ Source: PressCable Release ID: 89117642 In case of identifying any errors, concerns, or inconsistencies within the content shared in this press release that necessitate action or if you require assistance with a press release takedown, we strongly urge you to notify us promptly by contacting [error@releasecontact.com](mailto:error@releasecontact.com). Our expert team is committed to addressing your concerns within 8 hours by taking necessary actions diligently to rectify any identified issues or supporting you with the removal process. Delivering accurate and reliable information remains our top priority.

author: Fran Fuentes
title: Buen rollo de aficiones en La Rosaleda: "Que gane la Real Sociedad y suba el Málaga"
text: Buen rollo y ambientazo entre aficiones en La Rosaleda: "Que gane la Real y el Málaga suba a Primera" - Hinchas de ambos conjuntos han compartido risas y bebidas en la previa del partido - Una aficionada incluso llevaba la camiseta del Málaga bajo la de la Real Desde que se conoció que [el Málaga CF y la Real Sociedad se enfrentarían](https://www.eldesmarque.com/futbol/real-sociedad/20231212/el-malaga-rival-de-la-real-sociedad-en-dieciseisavos-de-copa-del-rey_300183797.html) en Copa del Rey, todo ha sido ilusión de cara al partido. Desde [la afición malaguista soñando con pasar de ronda](https://www.eldesmarque.com/futbol/malaga-cf/20231212/la-aficion-del-malaga-confia-en-la-victoria-ante-la-real-sociedad-si-le-echan-coraje-y-corazon-ganamos_300184213.html) hasta ex como [Loren Juarros y Luca Sangalli mostrando su cariño](https://www.eldesmarque.com/futbol/malaga-cf/20231212/loren-juarros-y-sangalli-encantados-con-el-malaga-real-sociedad-ha-sido-mi-vida_300183796.html) a su antiguo club. El malaguismo ha respondido, y la hinchada txuri urdin, también. Es por eso que hemos podido disfrutar de un gran ambiente en la previa del encuentro. Los aledaños de La Rosaleda eran una marea blanquiazul en la que apenas se podía distinguir quién era de cada equipo. Hinchas de ambos conjuntos compartían bebidas, risas e ilusiones en la previa del encuentro. Y en ElDesmarque no hemos querido perdernos la ocasión de salir a la calle y preguntarles a los aficionados cómo vivían este partido. Y lo cierto es que todo ha sido buen rollo y risas. En la afición visitante han agradecido mucho la hospitalidad de la ciudad de Málaga y del malaguismo, y haciendo gala del señorío que caracteriza a la hinchada txuri urdin, han dedicado sus mejores deseos para el club de Martiricos. Eso sí, después de este partido. Una aficionada llevaba la camiseta del Málaga bajo la de la Real Una aficionada de Donostia nos sorprendía contándonos que esta era la sexta vez que viajaba en lo que iba de año. Entendemos el lapsus, muchos de nosotros aún seguimos equivocándonos al poner '2024' en un papel. En cualquier caso, queda claro el amor de esta hincha por la Costa del Sol, tan acogedora, pero a la vez tan diferente a la playa de La Concha. Además, nos mostró que, bajo su casaca de la Real Sociedad, llevaba una camiseta del Málaga. Apostamos a que el resultado le da igual. También nos ha sorprendido una pareja de señores, ataviados hasta las cejas de elementos del equipo txuri urdin. El deseo de estos dos aficionados ha sido claro: "Que gane la Real Sociedad 1-3 y el Málaga que suba a Primera, que es lo que hace falta", aseveró uno de los dos. No hay duda de que entre la afición txuri urdin se guarda buen recuerdo del cuadro malaguista desde sus últimos enfrentamientos en LALIGA EA Sports. Ambientes como estos son los que nos gustan, e independientemente del resultado del partido, que reine la concordia, la fiesta y el buen rollo.

author: advfn.com
title: TEAMSTERS TO AMAZON: STOP DUCKING CONGRESS
text:
Union Demands Tech Giant Respond to Sen. Murphy, Congressional Inquiry
WASHINGTON , June 6, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- The Teamsters are joining Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.) and a bipartisan coalition of over 30 Senators in demanding that Amazon cooperate with a congressional inquiry requesting information on its exploitative Delivery Service Partner (DSP) program.
The lawmakers made the demand in a recent letter to Amazon CEO Andy Jassy , after the company sent a dishonest response to an earlier Senate oversight letter calling on Amazon to divulge whether its mistreatment and micromanagement of DSPs is compliant with federal labor law.
" Andy Jassy and Jeff Bezos think they can lie to the American people and break the law without consequences," said Teamsters General President Sean M. O'Brien . "This company is making billions off the backs of the hardworking men and women that drive Amazon vans, wear Amazon vests, and deliver Amazon packages, yet Amazon executives still have the audacity to turn around and deny that they're Amazon employees. No company should be above the law, period. The Teamsters continue to support Senate efforts that hold this corporate bully accountable for its dishonesty and mistreatment of its workers."
Sen. Murphy noted that Amazon's response to the earlier Senate oversight letter "included multiple self-contradictory statements, general assertions without factual support instead of the information requested and claims at odds with publicly available data and highly credible investigative journalism."
"Amazon's letter to the U.S. Senate is full of lies," said DSP Driver Jessie Moreno, who joined his co-workers in organizing with Teamsters Local 396. "Amazon is claiming that it doesn't control its drivers, but we all know that's not true. Amazon needs to take responsibility for our safety and well-being while we are delivering their packages. Amazon drivers and warehouse workers are standing together to demand the good jobs we deserve."
Last month, a National Labor Relations Board judge ruled that Amazon CEO Andy Jassy broke federal labor laws by making anti-union threats.
The Senators gave Jassy until July 5 to respond to their latest letter.
Founded in 1903, the International Brotherhood of Teamsters represents 1.3 million hardworking people in the U.S., Canada , and Puerto Rico . Visit Teamster.org for more information. Follow us on Twitter @Teamsters and "like" us on Facebook at Facebook.com/teamsters.
Contact:
Kara Deniz, (202) 497-6610
kdeniz@teamster.org
View original content to download multimedia:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/teamsters-to-amazon-stop-ducking-congress-302166629.html
SOURCE International Brotherhood of Teamsters
Copyright 2024 PR Newswire

author: Mike Cronin
title: Emilee Risteen looks to improve in Boston Marathon
text:
Emilee Risteen looks to improve in Boston Marathon
Emilee Risteen looks to improve in Boston Marathon
WMUR SPORTS DIRECTOR MIKE CRONIN SHARES HER STORY. DERRY EMILY RISTINE IS A CONSTANT FORCE AT THE BOSTON MARATHON. SHE’S BEEN NEW HAMPSHIRE’S TOP FEMALE FINISHER THE LAST THREE YEARS. IT’S A LITTLE BIT OVERWHELMING, TO BE HONEST. THIS IS STILL I KNOW IT’S BEEN A COUPLE OF YEARS THAT I’VE BEEN AT IT, BUT IT STILL FEELS LIKE NEW AND IT STILL FEELS EXCITING. SO I JUST TAKE IT ONE DAY AT A TIME, AND EACH RACE IS LIKE A NEW CHALLENGE, AND I JUST WANT TO BE THE BEST THAT I CAN BE. THE 29 YEAR OLD IS RUNNING HER FOURTH STRAIGHT BOSTON TEN MARATHONS OVERALL. COME ON, JACK TO THE LINE. TO THE LINE. ROUTE 18 IS THE TRACK COACH AT HER ALMA MATER, CONCORD CHRISTIAN ACADEMY. AS AN ELITE RUNNER, SHE’S SIDE BY SIDE WITH THE BEST IN THE WORLD. IT’S INTIMIDATING TO BE HONEST, AND SO IT’S LIKE A CHANCE TO ACTUALLY LEARN FROM THEM AND JUST LIKE, RESPECT THEM. RISTINE HOPES TO QUALIFY FOR THE OLYMPIC TRIALS IN 2028, BUT FOR NOW, SHE’S HOPING TO BEAT HER. 2024 BOSTON TIME OF TWO HOURS, 43 MINUTES AND 12 SECONDS. I LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THE BOSTON MARATHON. IT’S DEFINITELY MY FAVORITE MARATHON. I LIKE THAT IT’S CLOSE SO MY FAMILY CAN ALL BE THERE, AND IT JUST HAS THAT UNIQUE FEEL OF LIKE A SMALL RACE, EVEN THOUGH IT’S NOT SMALL AT ALL. I THINK RUNNING IS SOMETHING THAT INTIMIDATES A LOT OF PEOPLE, AND I FEEL LIKE WE’RE STARTING TO SHIFT WHERE MORE PEOPLE ARE TRYING IT AND MORE PEOPLE ARE EXCITED ABOUT IT. AND I THINK IT’S SOMETHING THAT REALLY ANYBODY CAN DO. AND YOU JUST HAVE TO START SMALL AND JUST KEEP WORKING AT IT. AND YO

This year – and every year – Emilee Risteen said she wants to improve.
